Okay this game is crazy fun. Playing competitive with a five queue of friends is some of the most fun ive had in a steam game with friends. Competitive is the big reason I play this game however the other game modes are definitely worth playing when not wanting to take a game too seriously. Deathmatch is nice way to practice aiming and map knowledge. Arms Race can be a good way to warm up using many different kinds of gun needing to get kills. Casual is similar to competitive but with more people on each team. Danger Zone is the battle royale part of the game. Its executed very well but isnt much my cup of tea. The game has workshop support so you can download maps to play by yourself or with friends. There are some changes that can be made but overall i think this game is worth a buy. Wait its free now? Thats actually pretty cool.
I love this game. Tactical first person shooter at its best. Fun alone. Fun with friends. Classic and it's FREE TO PLAY.
